title: When the enemy support is really nice, but you need money for a BF sword

replies.body:
Meanwhile I'm sitting there as Leona waiting for him to finally take the shot.

{{champion:89}} Kill him already Graves! You need to get that BF sword!

{{champion:104}} But. . .He's done no wrong. . .

{{champion:89}} F@CK THIS! (Q's the enemy sup and kills them.)

{{champion:89}} I'm the f@cking ADC now!

{{champion:104}} WTF Leona!? You took my kill!

{{champion:89}} . . . .
http://33.media.tumblr.com/5cf7b550f7e05baeda896006de8948b5/tumblr_inline_nm1d8oHi4r1t1r36n.gif

>
> Meanwhile I'm sitting there as Leona waiting for him to finally take the shot.
> 
> {{champion:89}} Kill him already Graves! You need to get that BF sword!
> 
> {{champion:104}} But. . .He's done no wrong. . .
> 
> {{champion:89}} F@CK THIS! (Q's the enemy sup and kills them.)
> 
> {{champion:89}} I'm the f@cking ADC now!
> 
> {{champion:104}} WTF Leona!? You took my kill!
>

> http://33.media.tumblr.com/5cf7b550f7e05baeda896006de8948b5/tumblr_inline_nm1d8oHi4r1t1r36n.gif

http://art.ngfiles.com/medium_views/339000/339972_tikonka_leona-deal-with-it.png
Did you know that Sunglasses reduce damage from The Sun?
If there were sunglasses that sun could wear without evaporating them, I'd give you a cookie.

._.)
[](http://drawception.com/pub/panels/2012/12-3/m1WejqT7B3-1.png)

And then graves afk

And boom lost game

Welcome to league of legends
Upvote for House Gif

And from the title I was hoping for a "Princess Bride" reference.
You: "You seem a decent fellow... I hate to kill you."
Enemy Support: "You seem a decent fellow... I hate to die."

Yeah, but I used that less than 2 weeks ago.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/yKnJELgm-when-someone-on-the-enemy-team-is-very-likable

I fell victim to one of the classic blunders—the most famous of which is, “Never get involved in a land war in Asia”—but only slightly less well-known is this, "Never assume Laughing Fish hasn't already done a meme." <3

Well at least you know better now.
http://media.giphy.com/media/wiQ9N7iMkMH2o/giphy.gif
Ah but it was a trap, there is a laughing fish meme in every post. It never mattered which one you picked.
*waits patiently*

And you still have not responded to my challenge so that I may avenge my father. Do you not have 6 fingers?!?!?!

(Bc maybe I totally counted wrong, in which case, do not prepare to die)
You mean Fiora's taunt?
I hate it when the Caitlyn seems like a legitimately nice person but keeps ulting me so i have to hate her.
Nice Rivens are the WORST! And thankfully quite rare.
What's next, a nice Vayne?
http://images2.fanpop.com/images/photos/3900000/Inconceivable-the-princess-bride-3983999-260-300.jpg
http://futureisfiction.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/thatssotrue_3749_1331166173.gif
This is my response to when people say c9 is a terrible team. *Cough* montecristo *Cough*
^ When someone complains that their teammates are trash, but they are all the same rank and no one is smurfing........
SEEN IT!!!!! It was wonderfully glorious.

> [{quoted}](name=Sirsir94,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ABHZ6prG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-10-06T15:38:58.175+0000)
>
> Nice Rivens are the WORST! And thankfully quite rare.

She's just so much fun...

http://33.media.tumblr.com/41a02a05bc6aab21f2b00ef252671f17/tumblr_n2k7twGjjX1qdk4doo4_r1_250.gif
Sorry fish but that isn't a twd gif.
That would be more appropriate for a annie sup being killed for the money.
http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/557/214/309.gif

I once was Vi facing an Yasuo top, he was a decent dude, so we made a competition out of it, dueling one another, no ganks, no running away, only fights to the death

It was glorious =3

> [{quoted}](name=Noctius28,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ABHZ6prG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-10-06T16:44:56.543+0000)
>
> I once was Vi facing an Yasuo top, he was a decent dude, so we made a competition out of it, dueling one another, no ganks, no running away, only fights to the death
> 
> It was glorious =3

Once, in a normals I was playing a mirror lane has Garen I had this happen. That was until their jungler showed up 20 mins into the game.
seems like a garen 1v1 should consist of  running at each other with a q, silencing each other, and running away from each other

> [{quoted}](name=maikokk,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ABHZ6prG,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-10-06T23:19:50.604+0000)
>
> seems like a garen 1v1 should consist of  running at each other with a q, silencing each other, and running away from each other

It was this, except we also tried to spin to win way too many times.

> [{quoted}](name=Noctius28,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ABHZ6prG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-10-06T16:44:56.543+0000)
>
> I once was Vi facing an Yasuo top, he was a decent dude, so we made a competition out of it, dueling one another, no ganks, no running away, only fights to the death
> 
> It was glorious =3

So you won right? You can use your ultimate when he uses his q to knock you up, and if he ults off that q then you canceled his ult and it goes on cooldown.

> [{quoted}](name=WolfBV,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ABHZ6prG,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2015-10-06T19:12:16.519+0000)
>
> So you won right? You can use your ultimate when he uses his q to knock you up, and if he ults off that q then you canceled his ult and it goes on cooldown.

yep but pre 6 he kicked my ass XD
Fish, whats with all the sad gifs from Breaking Bad.
http://img.pandawhale.com/75143-Im-sorry-Marie-Breaking-Bad-2x-V4Kf.gif

I swear dude, that scene in Breaking Bad had me in tears.

Such an innocent man shelled in the face, and for what?
That whole show was so well written, but gave me bad feels.
I mean, he was part of a meth empire, so I don't know if innocent is the right word to describe him. But still, killing him was brutal. That scene was a scene filled with feels.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=ABHZ6prG,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2015-10-07T10:33:36.999+0000)
>
> I mean, he was part of a meth empire, so I don't know if innocent is the right word to describe him. But still, killing him was brutal. That scene was a scene filled with feels.

Well I guess innocent maybe isn't the right word. But still, in a wide string of characters I found obnoxious and whiney (Skyler), grungy and revolting (Jesse), and someone morally deprived and twisted (Walter).. Gale was one character that I thought was genuine.
Nah. As a support main, I'm looking for a good fight, so bring it!
